# rafay_agent (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "rafay_agent" "tfdemoagent1" {
  metadata {
    name    = "tfdemoagent1"
    project = "upgrade"
  }
  spec {
    type = "ClusterAgent"
    cluster {
      name = "dev-test"
    }
    active = true
  }
}
```
